revised_title: Second-Order Deformation of a Compressible Isotropic Elastic Annulus Under Circular Shearing
tldr: This study investigates the second-order deformation of a compressible isotropic elastic annulus with an axial cylindrical hole, subjected to constant angular deformation on the interior boundary. The research uses finite Hankel transforms with Weber-Orr kernel functions to solve the problem and provides insights into the behavior of the annulus under different conditions.
scientific_discipline: Engineering and Technology > Mechanics of Materials
